title: In case of development of any land, the intended use shall conform to the permissible uses of the zone in which the land is situated
clause_text: In case of development of any land, the intended use shall conform to the permissible uses of the zone in which the land is situated. Following land use zones are demarcated on the Proposed Land- use Plan.

source_pdf.text_snippet: In case of development of any land, the intended use shall conform to the permissible uses of the zone in which the land is situated.
